title: HTC and Under Armour's fitness wearables delayed again until early 2016
text:
HTC and Under Armour's fitness wearables delayed again until early 2016 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
HTC's plans to enter the fitness wearable arena will have to wait a little while longer. The company has now confirmed that its plans to rel...
